attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the UK's involvement in the affairs of other countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are forever told we shouldn't be in Iraq or Afghanistan, but we should do something about Somalia, and of course Sudan.

It's about time we as a nation decided once and for all, should we interfere, or not. No exceptions, no special cases, either we are right to do it, or we are wrong.

Give the people of the uk a chance to have their say on the issue.
